pullrequest.title: Move FindODE.cmake to ign-cmake from ign-physics

content.raw:
Ahh, thanks for checking this, I will change it.  
One quick comment out of curiosity is would there be any complain if I use ODE_LIBRARY instead of ODE_LIBRARIES?   
If there will be complain, then when that would happen?  
I compiled the ODE demo and didn't see any warning / error and the test passed, I am a little concerned on how we could expose this error at an early stage?
content.html:
Ahh, thanks for checking this, I will change it.
One quick comment out of curiosity is would there be any complain if I use ODE_LIBRARY instead of ODE_LIBRARIES?
If there will be complain, then when that would happen?
I compiled the ODE demo and didn't see any warning / error and the test passed, I am a little concerned on how we could expose this error at an early stage?
